quote: He camped in one place after another as he traveled from the Neg聞eb to Beth聞el, until he arrived at the place where his tent had been between Beth聞el and A聞i,

The priest will examine the infection on his skin. When the hair in the infection has turned white and the appearance of the infection is deeper than the skin, it is the disease of leprosy. The priest will examine it and declare him unclean.
